EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Kevlar® XP
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® XP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Kevlar® XP products.
Recently through an email you expressed an interest in our new DuPont™ Kevlar® XP products.
The job of keeping the public safe requires a combination of high-level protection and high-level comfort. It’s why DuPont developed the next-generation of patented fabric technology used in Kevlar® XP™ technology for Soft Body Armor.
For more information about Kevlar® XP™, please visit our DuPont website. http://www.dupont.com/products-and-services/fabrics-fibers-nonwovens/fibers/brands/kevlar/products/kevlar-xp-soft-armor.html
_____________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Solutions
